title: I need FAST HELP about Neo Pax Sivir.Please
body: Hey Riot.I Send a ticket 3 days ago about the new Neo Pax Sivir with Code,Summoners Name and Region.And i still dont have answer.Code will be down today so please do something fast.....I play on EUNE.

replies.body: Toss me your ticket number and I'll take a look for you!  As long as you put in a ticket before the expiration you should be okay.  :D
